sentences.en: A particular stage in a periodic process or phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 定期重复现象的一次完整运行.

sentences.en: Keep air clean and fresh in the ward and conduct periodic sterilization.
sentences.cn: 病室内保持空气清新,定期消毒.

sentences.en: Long long ago, we knew the periodic motion of a planet.
sentences.cn: 很久以前, 我们就知道行星的周期运动.

sentences.en: Periodic checks are taken to ensure that high standards are maintained.
sentences.cn: 定期检查以确保维持高水准。
周期性的局部地区的灾变降低了种群的数量.

sentences.en: Refuses the waterdrop on the plate, achieves the periodic inspection.
sentences.cn: 严禁水滴在平板上, 做到定期检查.

sentences.en: Silicon is one of the most studied elements in the periodic table.
sentences.cn: 硅是周期表中最熟悉的元素之一.

sentences.en: Some commercial laboratories use periodic nitrate tests as guides.
sentences.cn: 许多商业性的试验室已应用定期的硝态氮分析作为指导.

sentences.en: The harmonic oscillator is an exceptionally important example of periodic motion.
sentences.cn: 谐振子在周期运动中是特别重要的.

sentences.en: The mathematicians turned to culling periodic solutions.
sentences.cn: 数学家们转而去挑选周期解.

sentences.en: The motion is periodic, which means it occurs identically over and over again.
sentences.cn: 这个运动是周期的, 意即运动以同样的形式重复出现.

sentences.en: The periodic buckling leaves the fibre in a waved conformation.
sentences.cn: 周期性的弯折在纤维中造成波形构成.

sentences.en: These arrangements are subject to periodic review.
We built an model for periodic multi - installment algorithm by linear programming.
sentences.cn: 利用线性规划得到了周期性的多趟调度算法的数学模型.

sentences.en: We can elaborate the electronic configuration for the atoms in the periodic chart.
sentences.cn: 我们能够精心安排周期表中原子的电子排布.

words.tran_cn: 定期地；周期性地；偶尔；间歇
周期，期间；时期；月经；课时

trans.tran_cn: 周期的，定期的，回归的，间歇的，时而发生的
trans.tran_en: happening a number of times, usually at regular times
